body:
that last little page with the stick figures doesn't really make any fucking sense except in the last panel he's saying "I bought it!  fun!" (i get the impression he might not be very smart...)
so as near as i can figure out he's posting like this to try to get you to support the artist if you like what you see 
at least that's what i hope is happening and he's at least being an insufferable shithead for a pro-social reason instead of an anti-social one
